parameters.name: word
parameters.description: String value of WordObject to return

parameters.name: useCanonical
parameters.description: If true will try to return the correct word root ('cats' -> 'cat'). If false returns exactly what was requested.

parameters.name: includeSuggestions
parameters.description: Return suggestions (for correct spelling, case variants, etc.)

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: API response format

operations.summary: Returns text pronunciations for a given word

parameters.description: Word to get audio for.

parameters.description: Use the canonical form of the word.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: API response format

operations.summary: Fetches audio metadata for a word.
operations.notes: The metadata includes a time-expiring fileUrl which allows reading the audio file directly from the API.  Currently only audio pronunciations from the American Heritage Dictionary in mp3 format are supported.
